title: 60 Magic Potion Bottles - 2D Icon Set with Color Variations for Fantasy Games
description: A diverse selection of 60 magic potion bottles, each with its own unique design and color variations for different gaming applications.
longDescription:
60 Unique Potion Bottle Icons: A diverse selection of 60 magic potion bottles, each with its own unique design and color variations for different gaming applications.

High Resolution: The icons are 512x512 pixels in size, providing crisp and clear visuals for a variety of screen sizes and game resolutions.

Universal Usage: These potion icons are perfect for fantasy games, RPGs, strategy games, and more. Whether you are developing inventory systems, crafting mechanics, or in-game shops, these icons will fit perfectly.

Easy Integration: These icons, provided in PNG format, are ready to use in your project without any additional configuration.

Color Variations: Multiple color options allow you to customize and differentiate potions for different purposes (healing, mana, strength, etc.). Ideal for multiple projects. Whether you're creating an RPG, building a fantasy inventory, or designing a magical adventure, this icon set has everything you need to stylishly represent your potions. The different color variations make it easy to identify potion types at a glance, improving both the aesthetics and functionality of your game.


File Details:


Format: PNG

Resolution: 512x512 pixels

Quantity: 60 icons in various color variations

Background: Black

Integration Designed with developers in mind, this resource can be easily integrated into Unity, Unreal, or any other game engine. The PNG format ensures compatibility with most platforms and software, and the high resolution allows you to resize or scale the icons without losing clarity.


Future Updates and Support This is the first version of the resource, and we aim to provide regular updates and improvements based on user feedback. If you encounter any problems or need additional features, do not hesitate to contact support. Your suggestions will help us improve this package!


Feedback is welcome We would love to hear from you! Please leave a review and rate the asset after using it in your project. Your feedback helps us improve and offer even better content for your future needs.


Contact: olgabutymova27@gmail.com
